subject: Business
title: Freemium: The Art of Free
description: A quick, practical guide to Freemium: The Art of Free.

hook.text: Spotify gives away music for free. But 236 million people pay for Premium anyway.

buildup.text: Freemium offers a basic product for free and charges for advanced features or convenience.

discovery.text: The free tier is marketing, not charity. Every free user is a potential upgrade and a referral.

twist.text: Most freemium products convert under 5%. If free costs too much to serve, you bleed money.

climax.text: The trick: make free good enough to hook users, but limited enough that power users must pay.

punchline.text: Free gets them in the door. Value keeps them paying.

quiz.question: What is the typical conversion rate for freemium products?
